title: The Life Goal Is To Get A Two-Story House
alternative_title: 이번 인생 목표는 이층집 마; My Goal in This Life Is to Have a Two-Story House
status: 이번 인생 목표는 이층집 마; My Goal in This Life Is to Have a Two-Story House
description:
Description :
        'No one will love you!'
'No one will trust you!'

"No one will ever love me."
"No one will ever trust me."

Frequent business failures on her father's part had pushed Jia into a life of hardship, and her boyfriend of six years cheating on her had brought her to the brink of despair.

"If there's a next life..."

She thought it was the end. But then...

"Maerin, are you awake? Are you feeling better now?"

Jia reincarnates as a refugee girl named "Maerin," who has crossed from the war-torn country of Helayton to Perrington. Will the new life as Maerin give Jia a chance to become wealthy and fulfill her dream of having her own home in this lifetime
